name: Neanderlands
description:
CSUMB Fall 2019 Game Developers Club Project

Play as a Neanderthal trapped in a volcano! Oh no! Find and use your pickaxe and torch to break rocks and burn vines as you try to find your way out of the volcano before it's too late. Oonga boonga!

WASD - movement

Mouse Movement - camera rotation

1, 2, 3 - Inventory controls

RMB - Interact

Our Team!

Julianna Woldstad - Project Lead & Artist

Calvin Norwood - Artist

Gerardo Hernandez - Level Designer

Eric Gonzalez - Programmer

Matthew Reyes - Programmer

Isaac Torres - Programmer

Arthur Timpe - Sound Designer

Big shout out to all these talented people!
